node._create_table_statement: CREATE TABLE `image` ( `image_id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `src` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, `alt` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, `thumbsrc` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, `description` text COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci, PRIMARY KEY (`image_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci PACK_KEYS=1
node.title: image
